articles.content:
DPRK paddlers successful at international tournament 
    Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Korean paddlers gave a good account of themselves at the "grand prize" international table-tennis tournament in Qingdao, China.
 Kim Hyon Hui and Kim Hyang Mi placed the second in the women's doubles and Ryu Hyon Sop and Kim Mi Yong first, O Su Yong second and Choe Yong Ran third in the men's and women's singles of the junior class (under 21 age).
